name: git-changelog-github-release
description: Draft release in GitHub generated from template using git-changelog-lib
author: Tomas Bjerre <tomas.bjerre85@gmail.com> (https://github.com/tomasbjerre)

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run prettier:write && npm run package && npm run copycli
scripts.copycli: cp -v node_modules/git-changelog-command-line/build/libs/git-changelog-command-line-*.jar dist && rm dist/*javadoc* dist/*sources* && mv dist/*jar dist/cli.jar
scripts.package: npx ncc build src/index.ts -o dist --source-map --license licenses.txt
